main event: A person observed a bright, round, white object moving at a very high speed from north to south. The object appeared to stop momentarily in mid-air before continuing south and disappearing from view.
interesting points: The object was observed for 5-10 minutes.
The object was seen at an angle of elevation between 30-45 degrees.
The object appeared to disturb the ground or leave some physical evidence.
The witness was willing to submit a signed statement about their observation.
The object's behavior, including stopping momentarily in mid-air, was described as unusual.
